myCpe
Class myReader

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.uima.resource.Resource_ImplBase
      org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource_ImplBase
          org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader_ImplBase
              myCpe.myReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.uima.collection.base_cpm.BaseCollectionReader, org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader, org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource, org.apache.uima.resource.Resource
public class myReader
extends org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader_ImplBase

This simple collection reader file line by line and paring them into id and sentence body.

    1) reads input file from directory. It can be configured with the following parameters:
  • InputDirectory - path to directory containing files
  • Encoding (optional) - character encoding of the input files
  • Language (optional) - language of the input documents
    • 2) Chuck the file into sentence for CAS holding 3) Chuck each sentence into id and sentence and save them into a new annotation: @see myCpe.line 4) Create a new view "freshLine" holding all the annotations

PARAM_INPUTFILE

public static final java.lang.String PARAM_INPUTFILE
Name of configuration parameter that must be set to the path of a directory containing input files.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PARAM_ENCODING

public static final java.lang.String PARAM_ENCODING
Name of configuration parameter that contains the character encoding used by the input files. If not specified, the default system encoding will be used.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PARAM_LANGUAGE

public static final java.lang.String PARAM_LANGUAGE
Name of optional configuration parameter that contains the language of the documents in the input directory. If specified this information will be added to the CAS.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PARAM_SUBDIR

public static final java.lang.String PARAM_SUBDIR
Name of optional configuration parameter that indicates including the subdirectories (recursively) of the current input directory.
